titleStmt.title: All the severall ordinances directions and votes of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for the speedy establishing of the Presbyteriall government. Ordered by the Lords assembled in Parliament, that these ordinances, directions, and votes be forthwith printed and published. Jo. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
Proceedings. 1645-1646
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: for John Wright at the Kings Head in the old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: "Directions of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament" has a separate title page dated 1645 on A1r.
Caption title on p. 1: Die Martis, 19 Augusti. 1645. Directions for the election of elders.
Final 2 leaves contain resolutions of Parliament.
Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2484 lacks two final leaves; variant.
Reproduction of originals in: Folger Shakespeare Library and Harvard University Library.
